display_help: Logging out in First Ward will enable you to dig up extra Inspirations on mission complete for a short time after you log back in. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Scavenger Day Job badge.
display_target_help: Logging out in First Ward will enable you to dig up extra Inspirations on mission complete for a short time after you log back in. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Scavenger Day Job badge.
